name: Chunks
description: Analyze chunks by their brick count and collider count.
author: x

authorized.description: A list of players authorized to use chunk analyzing commands.

commands.name: /chunks in
commands.description: Display the chunk you are in.

commands.name: /chunks analyze
commands.description: Save the game, then analyze its chunks, allowing for other commands to be run.

commands.name: /chunks count
commands.description: Display the number of bricks and colliders in the current chunk.

commands.name: /chunks mark
commands.description: Mark the 8 corners of the current chunk you are in with glowing 1x1x1 microbricks. White is unanalyzed, green is below limit, red is over limit.

commands.name: /chunks markall
commands.description: Mark the 8 corners of all analyzed chunks with bricks in them with glowing 1x1x1 microbricks. White is unanalyzed, green is below limit, red is over limit.

commands.name: /chunks clear
commands.description: Clear all of the chunk corner markers created with the marking commands, if any.
